metadata.name: Chess
metadata.description: The Basic Chess Board, brought to you by TFNLabs. As the owner of TFNLabs, I have a passion for playing chess and promoting the game in unique ways. In the Metagascar Metaverse, parks and other public spaces will feature chess games using this NFT as the official chess board. Only a select few will have the opportunity to own this unique piece, as the Basic Chess Board will be burned once the Gold Chess Board is created. Don't miss out on this once in a lifetime opportunity to own a piece of the Metagascar Metaverse and the chess world. Get your hands on the Basic Chess Board NFT now.
